title: Rumor: a challenge film
creator_credit: Centre for Mass Communication of Columbia University Press
brief_description: An animated cartoon which asks the question - “What defence against rumours?” Shows the spread of rumours in an actual case at Detroit some years ago. Mass panic and riots were caused by rumours resulting from a Sunday traffic jam.
